bytecode

Class BytecodeList

  • java.lang.Object
    • bytecode.BytecodeList

  • public class BytecodeList
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of Kitten bytecodes.
    Author:
    Fausto Spoto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BytecodeList(Bytecode head)
      Constructs a list of bytecodes containing a single bytecode.
      BytecodeList(Bytecode head, BytecodeList tail)
      Constructs a list of bytecodes that starts with the given bytecode and continues with the given list of bytecodes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Computes the concatenation of this list of bytecodes and another.

      Generates the Java bytecode corresponding to this list of bytecodes.
      Bytecode getHead()
      Yields the head of this list.
      BytecodeList getTail()
      Yields the tail of this list.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • BytecodeList

        public BytecodeList(Bytecode head,
                    BytecodeList tail)
        Constructs a list of bytecodes that starts with the given bytecode and continues with the given list of bytecodes.
        Parameters:
        head - the first bytecode of the list to be constructed
        tail - the list of bytecodes that follows head

      • BytecodeList

        public BytecodeList(Bytecode head)
        Constructs a list of bytecodes containing a single bytecode.
        Parameters:
        head - the only element of the list

    • Method Detail

      • getHead

        public Bytecode getHead()
        Yields the head of this list.
        Returns:
        the head of this list

      • getTail

        public BytecodeList getTail()
        Yields the tail of this list.
        Returns:
        the tail of this list

      • append

        public BytecodeList append(BytecodeList other)
        Computes the concatenation of this list of bytecodes and another. Intermediate nop instructions are removed.
        Parameters:
        other - the list of bytecodes that must be appended after this
        Returns:
        the result of the concatenation of this list of bytecodes with other. This list and other are not modified

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • generateJavaBytecode

        public org.apache.bcel.generic.InstructionList generateJavaBytecode(JavaClassGenerator classGen)
        Generates the Java bytecode corresponding to this list of bytecodes. This just calls bytecode.NonBranchingBytecode.generateJavaBytecode(JavaClassGenerator) on each non-branching bytecode in the list and appends the results.
        Parameters:
        classGen - the Java class generator to be used for this generation
        Returns:
        the Java bytecode corresponding to this list of bytecodes
